metadata.ground_truth: Apparently it does according to previous customers, they say that the view is beautiful especially on the higher floors.
metadata.predicted: Yes, the Ashley Hotel has rooms that are very nice and have great views of the surrounding area.

conversation.content: I'm looking to stay at a 3 star hotel in the north.
Sorry, I have no results for that query. Would you like to try a different area of town?
Are there any moderate priced hotels in the North?
Yes I have two. Would you like me to book one?
I need a hotel to include free parking; does either have that?
Yes both of them have free parking.
Is the Ashley hotel a 3 star hotel?
the ashley is actually a 2 star hotel.
Does this hotel have rooms with a good view of the neighborhood?
Yes, the Ashley Hotel has rooms that are very nice and have great views of the surrounding area.

That’s helpful to know—thanks for confirming the views at the Ashley. I’ll look into whether there are higher-floor rooms or balconies available and also compare with nearby 3-star options that offer similar rates and parking. <END> bye
